file_content.text: Are you still here?
Whoa! All right, all right! Everyone, back off! Just back off!
Look, no offense, but you show up out of nowhere, you're packing major hardware--we didn't figure you were here to shop, y'know? You're not, are you?
I want to know what you delivered to the Empire.
No, I'm not.
Whoa, not on your life. No way.
Let's talk about your other customers. I hear the Imps are big buyers.
I'm shopping for information.
Hey, come on--do you think I'm stupid?
Tell me everything you did for the Imps, or I keep shooting.
Shut up!
Whoa, whoa! Take it easy, all right?
I have to respect my clients' privacy. The Imps aren't exactly going to send me flowers for blabbing about their business, now are they?
If the Imperials invade, thousands of innocent people could die.
Lives are on the line.
Look, I'm not such a bad guy. But I have interests of my own to protect, you know?
I won't tell the Imperials if you don't, Blex.
It will be our secret.
That's really comforting. Really.
What do you think I'll do if you don't tell me?
Worry about me, not them.
Yeah, yeah. You're here with a gun, they aren't, I get it.
Just make it worth my while, all right? If I talk, I have to pump up security, make escape plans... all very expensive. Help me out, here.
Here. Now tell me what you know.
Fine--take these credits.
You've got yourself a deal.
I work for a Senator. He could get you what you need.
Evran could make that happen.
Hmm... a nice, fat Republic contract, huh? I think that could work out.
Well, you don't need to pay those guards I shot....
I already helped.
Hmm. Not a bad point, actually. We'll, uh, we'll call it even, then.
The Imps had us bring in a bunch of tunneling equipment and a giant bomb. Looked like Republic ordnance to me, truth be told. Reverse-engineered, maybe?
Am I not making myself clear, Blex? I want the intel.
No. [Wound Blex]
Ahh! Fine, fine, fine! It was tunneling equipment and a bomb, all right? A big one--maybe stolen from the Republic. I don't know, it looked Republic to me.
Where is the equipment now? What are the Imps up to?
Keep talking.
What kind of giant bomb? A ZR-57 orbital strike bomb?
The ZR-57? From Ord Mantell?
I don't know, I'm no expert. Looked big enough to drop from orbit, sure.
Are you a weapons expert on top of being a smuggler?
How would you know?
Nah. But when you run enough toys, you start to get an eye for who made 'em.
The Imps picked the stuff up here. I didn't ask where they took it or what they're planning. Not my business, right?
Now, if you'll excuse me, I've got a big mess to clean up here before I can see any more customers. Feel free to see yourself out.
